query:
SELECT
                post_opinions.id as opinion_id, post_opinions.opinion,
                is_not_null(post_opinion_votes.user_id) AS "voted!: bool",
                post_opinions.votes
            FROM
                post_opinions
            LEFT JOIN
                post_opinion_votes
            ON
                post_opinions.id = post_opinion_votes.opinion_id
            WHERE
                post_opinions.post_id = $1
            ORDER BY
                post_opinions.votes DESC;
